subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Connecticut Sun forward Nykesha Sales plans to sit out the W.N.B.A. season because of injuries. Sales, 31, said she needed time off to heal after playing a light schedule overseas in the off-season. She said she intended to return to the league. Sales played 248 consecutive games from 1999-06, the second-longest streak of consecutive games in the league.
